about_the_game:
Underground22 is a puzzle horror visual novel. Escape deadly rooms, solve puzzles, gain friendships, and find the truth behind what sits right beneath our feet.

The Story

What if you could erase the past, pick up the pieces of your mistakes and start over? 

Play as Mia, a young college student recovering from a mistake that cost her life as an athlete. Struggling with school, a dwindling social life, and the loss of her athletic abilities, Mia is kidnapped and forced into a game for her life; A game to decide the next Underground King.

A title that has controlled the United States from the shadows for millennia, a title without an owner, and no one to claim the throne.

The underground is a world with no mercy for anyone and has many secrets to hide. Mia must choose her allies and enemies within those participating to reveal the truths required for her survival.

It is a conspiracy that spans ages- poisoning the roots of the American dream that stretch to every facet of the Western way of life.

There are 22 contestants trapped underground, fighting for a chance to sit on the throne- or better yet, survive.

Features

- Experience the world of the underground.

Travel through abandoned train stations, underground casinos, and everything beneath our feet.

-Escape locked rooms.

Find your way out of escape rooms. Fight for your life against time.

- Survive "Popularity Games"

The king needs to be strong, smart, and powerful. Prove yourself to those around you and survive games where your relationships are tested.

- Forge relationships that matter.

Not everyone wants to see you succeed.

content_descriptors.notes:
Underground22 Contains:

Scenes of gore, death, and suicide. 
Mature themes, mentions of kidnapping, hostage taking, etc.
Drug and alcohol use and abuse.
Self harm.
Crude language and cursing.
